prompts.title: Create a User Manual for {{product_name}}
prompts.content: Develop a comprehensive user manual for {{product_name}} that includes detailed instructions on setup, operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting. Ensure the language is clear and suitable for {{target_audience}}.
prompts.description: Generates a user manual for a specific product tailored to its users.

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: The name of the product needing a user manual

variables.name: target_audience
variables.description: The intended users of the product

prompts.title: Write Installation Instructions for {{equipment}}
prompts.content: Compose step-by-step installation instructions for {{equipment}}. Include necessary safety precautions, required tools, and diagrams to assist {{installer_type}}.
prompts.description: Provides installation guidelines for specific equipment.

variables.name: equipment
variables.description: The equipment to be installed
variables.example: Industrial Air Conditioning Unit Model AC-5000

variables.name: installer_type
variables.description: The person or group performing the installation

prompts.title: Develop API Documentation for {{api_name}}
prompts.content: Create thorough API documentation for {{api_name}}. Include endpoint descriptions, request and response examples, authentication methods, and error codes to assist developers integrating the API.
prompts.description: Generates comprehensive API documentation.

variables.name: api_name
variables.description: The name of the API

prompts.title: Create a Maintenance Manual for {{machine}}
prompts.content: Write a detailed maintenance manual for {{machine}}. Include regular maintenance schedules, procedures, troubleshooting tips, and parts replacement guidelines.
prompts.description: Produces a maintenance guide for machinery or equipment.

variables.name: machine
variables.description: The machine requiring a maintenance manual

prompts.title: Draft Technical Specifications for {{product_or_system}}
prompts.content: Develop technical specifications for {{product_or_system}}. Detail the design, components, performance criteria, and compliance standards to guide engineers and developers.
prompts.description: Creates technical specs outlining product or system details.

variables.name: product_or_system
variables.description: The product or system being specified
variables.example: NextGen Solar Panel Array Model SP-300

prompts.title: Compose a Troubleshooting Guide for {{software_or_hardware}}
prompts.content: Write a troubleshooting guide for {{software_or_hardware}}. Identify common issues, error messages, and step-by-step solutions to assist users in resolving problems.
prompts.description: Provides users with solutions to common issues.

variables.name: software_or_hardware
variables.description: The software or hardware product

prompts.title: Develop Release Notes for Version {{version_number}} of {{product}}
prompts.content: Create release notes for version {{version_number}} of {{product}}. Include new features, bug fixes, known issues, and upgrade instructions for users.
prompts.description: Informs users about updates in a new product version.

variables.name: version_number
variables.description: The new version number

variables.name: product
variables.description: The name of the product

prompts.title: Create a System Architecture Document for {{system_name}}
prompts.content: Draft a system architecture document for {{system_name}}. Detail the system components, interactions, data flow diagrams, and technology stack used.
prompts.description: Outlines the structural design of a system.

variables.name: system_name
variables.description: The name of the system

prompts.title: Write a Software Requirements Specification for {{project_name}}
prompts.content: Develop a Software Requirements Specification (SRS) document for {{project_name}}. Include functional requirements, non-functional requirements, use cases, and acceptance criteria.
prompts.description: Defines the software requirements for a project.

variables.name: project_name
variables.description: The name of the software project

prompts.title: Compose Test Plans for {{application_or_system}}
prompts.content: Create detailed test plans for {{application_or_system}}. Outline test objectives, scope, resources, schedules, and test cases to ensure quality assurance.
prompts.description: Establishes a testing framework for software or systems.

variables.name: application_or_system
variables.description: The application or system to be tested

prompts.title: Develop Code Documentation for {{codebase_or_module}}
prompts.content: Write comprehensive code documentation for {{codebase_or_module}}. Include explanations of functions, classes, methods, and examples of usage to assist other developers.
prompts.description: Provides in-depth documentation of code for developers.

variables.name: codebase_or_module
variables.description: The codebase or specific module

prompts.title: Create Knowledge Base Articles for {{topic}}
prompts.content: Write informative knowledge base articles on {{topic}}. Include clear explanations, step-by-step guides, and FAQs to help users understand and troubleshoot.
prompts.description: Generates support articles for a knowledge base.

variables.name: topic
variables.description: The subject of the article

prompts.title: Draft Data Sheets for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Compose data sheets for {{product_or_service}}. Highlight key specifications, performance metrics, and technical features important to clients and engineers.
prompts.description: Provides technical details in a concise format.

variables.name: product_or_service
variables.description: The product or service for the data sheet

prompts.title: Write Configuration Guides for {{system_or_software}}
prompts.content: Develop detailed configuration guides for {{system_or_software}}. Include initial setup steps, customization options, and best practices for optimal performance.
prompts.description: Helps users configure systems or software correctly.

variables.name: system_or_software
variables.description: The system or software to configure

prompts.title: Compose Training Manuals for {{tool_or_application}}
prompts.content: Create a training manual for {{tool_or_application}} aimed at {{user_group}}. Include lessons, exercises, and quizzes to facilitate learning.
prompts.description: Produces educational material for training purposes.

variables.name: tool_or_application
variables.description: The tool or application to train on

variables.name: user_group
variables.description: The group being trained

prompts.title: Develop a Process Documentation for {{business_process}}
prompts.content: Write detailed process documentation for {{business_process}}. Include process maps, roles and responsibilities, inputs and outputs, and KPIs.
prompts.description: Defines and documents business processes.

variables.name: business_process
variables.description: The business process to document

prompts.title: Create a Security Documentation for {{system_or_application}}
prompts.content: Develop security documentation for {{system_or_application}}. Outline security protocols, user access levels, data protection measures, and compliance requirements.
prompts.description: Provides guidelines on security measures and policies.

variables.name: system_or_application
variables.description: The system or application to secure

prompts.title: Write Deployment Guides for {{software_version}}
prompts.content: Compose a deployment guide for {{software_version}}. Include pre-deployment steps, environment setup, deployment procedures, and post-deployment validation.
prompts.description: Assists in deploying software versions correctly.

variables.name: software_version
variables.description: The software version to deploy

prompts.title: Draft Regulatory Compliance Documentation for {{industry_standard}}
prompts.content: Prepare documentation to ensure compliance with {{industry_standard}}. Include policies, procedures, and controls necessary for adherence.
prompts.description: Helps organizations comply with industry regulations.

variables.name: industry_standard
variables.description: The regulatory standard to comply with

prompts.title: Create Functional Specifications for {{software_project}}
prompts.content: Develop functional specifications for {{software_project}}. Detail user interactions, system behaviors, and functional requirements to guide developers.
prompts.description: Defines what the software should do from the user's perspective.

variables.name: software_project
variables.description: The software project in question

prompts.title: Compose Interface Design Documents for {{application}}
prompts.content: Write an interface design document for {{application}}. Include UI mockups, user interaction flows, and design principles to be followed.
prompts.description: Documents the design of user interfaces for applications.

variables.name: application
variables.description: The application requiring interface design

prompts.title: Develop Test Cases for {{functionality}}
prompts.content: Create detailed test cases for {{functionality}}. Include test steps, expected results, and test data to validate the functionality.
prompts.description: Helps QA teams in testing specific functionalities.

variables.name: functionality
variables.description: The specific functionality to test

prompts.title: Write White Papers on {{technical_topic}}
prompts.content: Compose a white paper on {{technical_topic}}. Provide in-depth analysis, background information, and potential solutions to inform and persuade technical audiences.
prompts.description: Generates authoritative reports on technical topics.

variables.name: technical_topic
variables.description: The technical topic to explore

prompts.title: Create FAQs for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Develop a list of frequently asked questions and answers for {{product_or_service}}. Address common user concerns and provide clear, concise responses.
prompts.description: Helps users by addressing common questions.

variables.name: product_or_service
variables.description: The product or service the FAQs are for

prompts.title: Design Technical Diagrams for {{system_or_process}}
prompts.content: Create technical diagrams for {{system_or_process}}. Include flowcharts, network diagrams, or schematics to visually represent technical information.
prompts.description: Provides visual representations of systems or processes.

variables.name: system_or_process
variables.description: The system or process to diagram
variables.example: Data Flow in E-Commerce Transaction Processing

prompts.title: Develop Configuration Management Plans for {{project}}
prompts.content: Write a configuration management plan for {{project}}. Outline procedures for configuration identification, control, auditing, and status accounting.
prompts.description: Ensures proper management of project configurations.

variables.name: project
variables.description: The project requiring a configuration management plan

prompts.title: Compose an End-of-Life (EOL) Notice for {{product_version}}
prompts.content: Draft an EOL notice for {{product_version}}. Inform customers about the discontinuation, important dates, and recommended next steps or upgrades.
prompts.description: Communicates product discontinuation to stakeholders.

variables.name: product_version
variables.description: The specific product version being retired
